# FiltrationLike

 --- 

## meta.FiltrationLike { #meta.FiltrationLike }

`meta.FiltrationLike()`

Protocol interface for types that represent (abstract) simplicial complexes 

A type is _FiltrationLike_ if it implements the Mapping[Any, SimplexLike] protocol.
